title: Banned for 2 weeks for THIS! UNBELIEVABLE RIOT!
body:
So i flamed my teammates lightly because they ran it down and told me it was my punishment for taking their roles(the game gave me the role and they didn't say anything in champ select about it)( yasuo, brand). game ended like 5 minutes later and the entire team and myself reported them. i was banned shortly after i guess?. 
(also yes i was chat banned for 10 games and 25 games but they were each for one game infractions for situations identical to this one. i flamed a bit more but its not nearly as much as (TYLER1) for example has ever flamed.

Im trying to be a good player with a good attitude but after this i really have lost the understanding of how to reform other than not using the chat feature entirely. It seems like this game caters to physical trolling and allows people to do it freely and  if you ask them to stop nicely they shit on you. It is a lose lose situation and i feel like this isnt the league of legends i used to play at all anymore.




chat logs :   even without the context of what they said i wasn't even that toxic and i can provide the video of brand running down mid since riot lets us record every match.


Game 1
In-Game

BobAtBobDotCom: go afk

BobAtBobDotCom: actually
BobAtBobDotCom: report brand
BobAtBobDotCom: he said he has to punish us for picking his role

game 2 
chat logs: this one is more surprising because i was being flamed hard by my top laner and i cant even see how anything i said isn't justified (other than the hang myself part which was a joke) and like i said we can re-watch all the game play :(.

Game 2
In-Game

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=BobAtBobDotCom,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=0NWg9omR,comment-id=,timestamp=2020-02-28T00:01:15.425+0000)
>
> So i flamed my teammates 


+1 for saving everyone some time

> Im trying to be a good player with a good attitude but after this i really have lost the understanding of how to reform other than not using the chat feature entirely

Or just use chat positively? Stop calling for reports (this achieves nothing), stop complaining about your team - chat is for calling objectives and co-ordinating, not witch hunts.

>BobAtBobDotCom: just report yasuo
BobAtBobDotCom: can play with people who have mental break downs
BobAtBobDotCom: like this
BobAtBobDotCom: do i even wanan win with them on my team
BobAtBobDotCom: is the question
BobAtBobDotCom: i rearely ask myself
BobAtBobDotCom: go afk
BobAtBobDotCom: \
BobAtBobDotCom: reporrt yasuo afk
BobAtBobDotCom: ex ban
BobAtBobDotCom: ez
BobAtBobDotCom: he also ran it down and flamed
BobAtBobDotCom: so that also
BobAtBobDotCom: he came back when he would get reported
BobAtBobDotCom: but pls report him
BobAtBobDotCom: hes the classes say one more word and im afk player
BobAtBobDotCom: branded inted hard '
BobAtBobDotCom: but yasuo
BobAtBobDotCom: is way worse
BobAtBobDotCom: actually
BobAtBobDotCom: report brand
BobAtBobDotCom: he said he has to punish us for picking his role

None of this is useful.

> BobAtBobDotCom: darius
BobAtBobDotCom: chat restricted
BobAtBobDotCom: darius youve typed an essay this game congratulations
BobAtBobDotCom: keep it up
BobAtBobDotCom: iva had you muted for half of it
BobAtBobDotCom: so yur actually just a loser
BobAtBobDotCom: just report hi m

Or this.
Ty this is good advice I will use! I understand why I was punished but I think it's a bit extreme :(

> [{quoted}](name=BobAtBobDotCom,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=0NWg9omR,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2020-02-28T00:48:28.787+0000)
>
> Ty this is good advice I will use! I understand why I was punished but I think it's a bit extreme :(

No problem dude - keep it positive/constructive and you'll be fine. Light-hearted banter is all good, just leave out the rest.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

> BobAtBobDotCom: go afk
> BobAtBobDotCom: \
> BobAtBobDotCom: reporrt yasuo afk

This actually made me laugh hahaha

People murder eachother, but stealing a candy bar is still against the law, so idk what your point is with other people doing worse. Like yeah, of course other people have done worse. Dont break the rules, and you wont get punished. Break the rules, and you probably will get punished. Stop convoluting it with what other people have done lol. Thats meaningless.

Mate, you look like the person that should type nothing really. Whatever you want to communicate to your team, ping it. There is almost nothing that can't be pinged. And it's faster. And none needs to read.
All you wanna type is shit like "Good luck team", "WP", "GJ" etc. And maybe your occasional "ward red/blue"

> Banned for 2 weeks for THIS! UNBELIEVABLE RIOT!

OK.

> So i flamed my teammates lightly

Surprised Pikachu face?

> Im trying to be a good player with a good attitude

And you're failing at that.
You shoulda seen what my teammates said *surprised Pikachu face*
But yes I failed. :( The people on my team who everyone was mad at succeeded

> [{quoted}](name=BobAtBobDotCom,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=0NWg9omR,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2020-02-28T01:30:32.817+0000)
>
> But yes I failed. :( The people on my team who everyone was mad at succeeded

Aw man, well. They won't succeed in the long run because eventually their behaviour will catch up to them.
Were you perma'd or just 14'd?

I'd have to agree with these guys, chat is to be positive and keep moral up. Call objectives and check in on lanes doing well or poorly. Make calls and just ignore the BS. You will get the games that suck...a lot...but then you will get that one team comp where every planet aligns and you win in like 10 minutes.

Prepare the apples.

I only went as far as "report yasuo". That should be like a Behavior Forum tagline: "report Yasuo to ban Yasuo, say it to be banned by Yasuo."
